room_title: Escape room "World's Fair Hotel" by Bangor Escape Rooms in Bangor
room_description: The year is 1893 and you and your colleagues at Pabst Brewing have checked into the World’s Fair Hotel. Your team is at the Columbian Exposition to try to win the Pabst beer a blue ribbon for the “America’s Best” category. After dropping off your luggage and freshening up, your team goes to leave but the door is locked. You have only one hour to escape and get the Pabst beer to the Exposition before the judging starts!
